q: why does the man wear life jackets during drifting
pred: The man is wearing life jackets to ensure his safety while drifting on the river. Life jackets are essential for people participating in water sports or activities, as they help to keep the person afloat in case they fall into the water. In the video, the man is seen wearing a life jacket while drifting on the river, which shows that he is taking necessary precautions to ensure his safety during the activity.
